host.label: Management IP address or Hostname
host.description: Specify the IP address or  hostname of the data source so that IBM Cloud Pak for Security can communicate with it

port.label: Host Port
port.description: Set the port number that is associated with the Host name or IP

help.label: Need additional help?
help.description: More details on the data source setting can be found in the specified link

selfSignedCert.label: Elasticsearch connection certificate
selfSignedCert.description: Use self-signed Security Sockets Layer (SSL) or CA-signed certificate or secure communication between web reports or REST API server and the authorized user

sni.label: Server Name Indicator
sni.description: The Server Name Indicator (SNI) enables a separate hostname to be provided for SSL authentication

username.label: Username
username.description: Username with access to the search API

password.label: Password
password.description: Password of the user with access to the search API

access_token.label: Access Token (Token Based Access)
access_token.description: Access Token is required for token based authentication

api_key.label: API Key (Key Based Access)
api_key.description: API Key is required for Key based authentication

id.label: ID (Key Based Access)
id.description: ID is required for Key based authentication with API Key
